Reviews.Title: The best laptop in the world !!
Reviews.Author: Walter Cabrera
Reviews.Content: Wow I can say this has been the best laptop and bought till this day, and that I have a Asus G73, alienware m17x R3, but the m18x is class apart.I am a very detail-oriented person (my friends say I am never satisfied with anything) but I have to say that with the m18x I am, why not say it till I was impressed with this machine, I can run all games on the market till this day .My score in Windows is like my m17x r3Processor: 7.5Memory (RAM): 7.6Graphics: 7.7Gaming graphics: 7.7Primary hard disk: 7.7What else I can tell you: hmmm ..... list XD 1) Key: very good (not the best but does everything you need to do and a little more). 2) Mouse: I was impressed very good the best laptop mouse and had. 3) Display: very good (not perfect). 4) Video Card: hmm there depends on what you want to put (my case CrossFireX 6990) 5) Time Battery: I managed to last from 4 hours to 5 hours (Intel mode)Others Score: Dirt 3: 65 FPS FFXIVBenchmark: 3557 Heaven DX11 Benchmark 2.5: 54.3 (all max, except that in normal Tessellation and of course DX11)
